CustomField.description: This field shows whichever Value was entered.
CustomField.formula: TRIM( IF(ValueCheckbox__c = TRUE, "TRUE", IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(ValueCurrency__c))),TEXT(ValueCurrency__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ValueEmail__c)),ValueEmail__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(ValueNumber__c))),TEXT(ValueNumber__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(ValuePercent__c))),TEXT(ValuePercent__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ValuePhone__c)),ValuePhone__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ValueText__c)),ValueText__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(LEFT(ValueTextArea__c,255))),LEFT(ValueTextArea__c,255), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ValueURL__c)),ValueURL__c, IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Street__c)), (Street__c & " " & City__c & " " & State__c & " " & Country__c & " " & PostalCode__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(ValueDate__c))),TEXT(ValueDate__c), IF( NOT(ISBLANK(ValueDateTime__c)),TEXT(ValueDateTime__c),"" )))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows whichever Value was entered.
CustomField.label: Question Response
